name: Bacon editors

desc.html: A conglomeration of two images was used to create this image of a smiley face over a slice of cooked bacon.

tags: files from freely licensed external sources

wiki.Artist:
Source images: Renee Comet (photographer) (bacon image), User:East718, (smiley image)
This image: This conglomeration image was created by User:Northamerica1000, from the images listed in the Source section above.
wiki.Permission: Bacon image is in the public domain (https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:CookedBacon.jpg), and smiley image is released under CC-BY-SA (https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:718smiley.svg)
